rComments: Professor Mosqueda is very passionate about what he teaches, however he tends to reuse class materials including readings, videos, discussion topics, etc. I would not recommend taking his class because the material is incredibly repetitive, and the Professor was constantly unorganized and under-prepared. Take another class if you can.
Syllabus was a joke. Dates constantly changed and readings flipped around often. Professor is very helpful and will clarify material. He is understanding and entertaining to listen to. Passionate.

Bit of a heavy reading load, and of course there's a 10 page research paper, but he has you do outlines and drafts along the way so you only have a few pages left at the end. Its not my first choice, but its a decent alternative for an ED class.
One of UCSC's best professors. The material was quite repetitive, but his passion for the subject totally made the class worth the time. If you have a chance to take one of his classes, DO IT!
